languages.text: "После того, как я отрубил{mf||а} голову дракону кабала, Опустошительная буря стала гибче в своих взглядах на альянсы".
"After I beheaded the Kabal's Dracon, the Reaving Tempest became more flexible in its approach to alliances."
languages.original_text: "После того, как я отрубил{mf||а} голову дракону кабала, Опустошительная буря стала гибче в своих взглядах на альянсы".

traits.locale_text: "After I beheaded the Kabal's Dracon, the Reaving Tempest became more flexible in its approach to alliances."
"After I beheaded the Kabal's Dracon, the Reaving Tempest became more flexible in its approach to alliances."
"After I beheaded the Kabal's Dracon, the Reaving Tempest became more flexible in its approach to alliances."
"After I beheaded the Kabal's Dracon, the Reaving Tempest became more flexible in its approach to alliances."
"After I beheaded the Kabal's Dracon, the Reaving Tempest became more flexible in its approach to alliances."
"After I beheaded the Kabal's Dracon, the Reaving Tempest became more flexible in its approach to alliances."

languages.text: « Après que j'ai décapité son dracon, la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse s'est montrée plus souple en matière d'alliances. »
languages.original_text: "After I beheaded the Kabal's Dracon, the Reaving Tempest became more flexible in its approach to alliances."

traits.locale_text: « Après que j'ai décapité son dracon, la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse s'est montrée plus souple en matière d'alliances. »

languages.text: «Después de que decapitara al Dracón de la Kábala, la Tempestad Asoladora adoptó un enfoque más flexible en sus alianzas».
languages.original_text: "After I beheaded the Kabal's Dracon, the Reaving Tempest became more flexible in its approach to alliances."

traits.locale_text: «Después de que decapitara al Dracón de la Kábala, la Tempestad Asoladora adoptó un enfoque más flexible en sus alianzas».

languages.text: “我砍掉了狂风阴谋团裁决官的脑袋。在那之后，他们对盟友没那么挑剔了。”
languages.original_text: "After I beheaded the Kabal's Dracon, the Reaving Tempest became more flexible in its approach to alliances."

traits.locale_text: “我砍掉了狂风阴谋团裁决官的脑袋。在那之后，他们对盟友没那么挑剔了。”

languages.text: 「私は陰謀団のドラコンの首を落とした後、リーヴィング・テンペストは同盟へのアプローチをより柔軟なものにしたんだ」
languages.original_text: "After I beheaded the Kabal's Dracon, the Reaving Tempest became more flexible in its approach to alliances."

traits.locale_text: 「私は陰謀団のドラコンの首を落とした後、リーヴィング・テンペストは同盟へのアプローチをより柔軟なものにしたんだ」

languages.text: "Nachdem ich den Dracon der Kabale enthauptet hatte, wurde der Plündernde Sturm deutlich flexibler, was seine Herangehensweise an Bündnisse anging."
languages.original_text: "After I beheaded the Kabal's Dracon, the Reaving Tempest became more flexible in its approach to alliances."

traits.locale_text: "Nachdem ich den Dracon der Kabale enthauptet hatte, wurde der Plündernde Sturm deutlich flexibler, was seine Herangehensweise an Bündnisse anging."
